SUB_W06_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Constantine

SUB_W06_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_010.text: In searching my database, I've learned that aspects of what we consider 'the heart' are located in both our hearts and our brains. Do you think that means my heart could also be somewhere in this world?

SUB_W06_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W06_WRLD_DIVA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I suspect, my dear, you will find your
heart in the place you least expect it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, there's someone here.
We should chat with 'em.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Blurp! There it is! The foreign body that's
thrown the entire Kosmos into turmoil!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Me? Oh no, you're mistaken: I'm just
a traveler in search of my heart.
I dinnae intend your world any harm.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't play dumb with me! You are clearly
a foreign body, and that heart story
smells like a pile of excreta. Now prepare to be excised like
the malignant growth you are!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hmm... I'll grant that you don't resemble a
typical malignancy, but you're also not
anything I've seen before. Yes, of course. Perhaps you're some sort
of benign growth, or even a—

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am D05-72314, commonly known
as Songstress Diva No. 5—but ye
can simply call me Diva.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
A benign songstress growth? Fascinating!
Yes, well, while benignancies are not subject
to excision, if this is an attempt at deception,
you will pay for it in blood and bile!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am Byaku, a priest that protects
the integrity of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Do ye know anything about
my heart, Byaku?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
It is said there is heart within all the Kosmos,
and yet nowhere within the Kosmos. But I am
not among those who say so, for I have never
seen anything of the sort.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That said, you clearly appear set on searching
for your heart no matter what I say. I am willing
to help you in this, but as I am in the midst of
my rounds, it must wait until I complete them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, that'd be grand. I'll just wait here
until your rounds are complete, then.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
No, I'd prefer you to help me.
Come along, Diva.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I just hope I can be of some
use to ye in all this.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Excellent! Now then, my rounds often take me
to dangerous places. As my forte is defense,
I would be pleased if you could assume a more
offensive role.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I'm to be in charge of combat?
Aye, I can handle that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Our first destination is over there,
so let us be off. Locomotion, ho!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the Digestica, one of our four great
temples. At this holy site, substances from
the outer worlds are processed and broken
down to provide energy to the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text:
So the Digestica functions
as a stomach.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Defending these temples is the primary
duty for those in the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Dear me, this Digestica appears to be
functioning poorly. Color is a bit off,
don't you think?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Yes, I noticed this as well; an abnormality
seems to have emerged for some reason.
We will need to investigate at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.text:
A foreign body—and the malignant kind!
You must excise it at once!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.text:
The malignancies that infiltrate the body
hide in all manner of places, and seek nothing
less than the destruction of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
The malignancies and the poor condition of
the Digestica dinnae seem to be related.
I'm afraid the real problem is elsewhere.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Mmm, yes. You may be right.
Have you noticed anything else?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Just those wee oily clumps stuck to
the pillars around the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Ah, yes! Those are fat globules. While the Kosmos
requires them to function, I doubt the Digestica
would be able to process so many at once.
This may indeed be the anomaly we seek.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.text:
Too many greasy chips
for this poor tum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.text:
We must destroy the fats. Let us break them
into smaller pieces so they will be easier
for the Digestica to process and unload.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
To think that malignancies have infested
even this most sacred of lands...
We must be ever vigilant!

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
That was the last of the fats.
If we repair the Digestica now,
it should resume its normal function.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.text: This is the end of your rounds, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.text:
The end? By the Kosmos, no!
Now we head to the other temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.text: Then I'll continue my combat duties.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.text:
The flow in this passage has been restored.
We can use it to reach our destination.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This is a blood vessel then, I believe?
And I'm to traverse it as if I were a
blood cell? That's magic, it is!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Pray cease flapping your mandible
and come with me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.text:
I've not had the experience of swimming
through a vein before; I'm gathering
heaps of precious data here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the Respiquary—the temple that
controls the atmosphere of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So lungs, then. Oh, but these are
in rather sad shape as well.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.text: Byaku! How are you today, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, that's Blan, one of the junior priests.
He's been assigned to the Respiquary guard.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
That cannae be true. According to my analysis,
these lungs are functioning abnormally. 
Just look at the wind blowing out of them
if ye need proof of that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Of course there's a wind blowing out of it!
Do you not remember me telling you how the
Respiquary controls the atmosphere?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Is that weird foreign body
bothering you, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
That's the diva. Please treat her as
you would any of my subordinates.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Wasn't aware I was
subordinate to you, love.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.text: Also, now that you mention it, the wind is blowing a bit more strongly than usual. I wonder what that's about.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.text:
The strength of that wind
is surely an anomaly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Anomaly, sir! We have an anomaly!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We must investigate this at once.
To the Respiquary!

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.text:
The wind's too strong for us to approach
directly. Best come at it from the sides.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.text:
Blast! The wind's too strong to
approach it from this direction.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary's condition is irregular.
It must be repaired at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.text: Perhaps the Kosmos has a cold?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.text: It must have blown in on the wind.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Let us repair the Respiquary at once.
Give us a hand, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.text:
We merely slapped a bandage over the problem,
but that should keep it working for a while.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Is your function restorative
in nature then, love?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Those born into the priesthood have a sacred
duty to protect the Kosmos, and have been
blessed with the power to repair the temples. One could say we are the chosen elite,
beings selected by the very Kosmos itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Thank you for the assistance, sir!
I can take it from here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Good, because I must return to my rounds—
and between the events at the Digestica
and this, I fear some evil is afoot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, a brain! But here's a bit of an odd thing:
its functions include those popularly applied
to the 'heart' by most folks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Cognitheon—the center of the Kosmos,
and the place that controls all other holy sites.
As I feared, there is an anomaly here. We must find and excise it with all speed,
for if the Cognitheon were to shut down
the entire Kosmos would descend into chaos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Shouldn't there be a guard here?
'Cause I dinnae see one.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
This is the territory of a contemporary
of mine in the priesthood named Safed.
But as for where he is...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Repairing the Cognitheon should be
our top priority. The heart I seek is
likely to be found here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Indeed. Whatever this anomaly is, it appears
to have severed the Cognitheon's connection
to the circuits which supply its power.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
A loss of brain function is a proper issue
for living things! We'd best get a move
on repair it at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh dear. I have never seen such a thing.
I'm not even sure how to approach this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
There tend to be patterns to errors in
electrical transmissions. Let's see if
you and me can figure it out, then.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Right then, I assume those objects surrounding
the Cognitheon are electrical circuits—and the
circuits across from us look different.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
While a small amount of electricity
is flowing over there, its range is
insufficient to reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Aye, so we should try to link those circuits
to each other and create a flow of electricity
back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.text: Interesting. Yes, that just might work.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Let's join this circuit to
the adjacent one, then.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
A fine idea. But first, we must excise
the malignancies in the area.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Excision complete.
Now on to those circuits!

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Not all of the circuits are operating.
Select the ones that electricity seems
able to flow through, then link them.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.text:
Ach, we've got no juice—I dinnae
think this circuit is functional.
Best we start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.text:
The electricity is flowing! Now we
just need to do this over and over
until we reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.text:
Ach, we've got no juice—I dinnae
think this circuit is functional.
Best we start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.text:
Ach, we've got no juice—I dinnae
think this circuit is functional.
Best we start again.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.text:
All right, we have electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon. Now to restore
power to the main part itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.text:
We should link circuits together until
electricity reaches the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Aye, then I'll get to
excising the malignancies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I could not have done it without you,
Diva. You have my thanks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Oh my days! Someone's lying
on the ground over there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Heavens, man! You're hurt!
What happened to you!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Dear me, his life signs are weakening.
Please try to hold on, Mr. Safed!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I'm sorry... I failed to defend the
Cognitheon, and now...I'm done for...
I leave the Cognitheon...in your hands...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.text:
That wound must have been
inflicted by a malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Safed was the most powerful member of the
priesthood; no mere malignancy could have
ever laid him so low.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.text: Then who could have harmed him so?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.text: We must visit the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A heart, is it? Perhaps my own
can be found here, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The Circuleum has completely stopped!
If we don't do something, all activity
in the Kosmos will soon cease—but I
have absolutely no idea WHAT to do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.text:
All hope's not lost, love. If the Circuleum
functions as a heart, then perhaps it will
respond to treatments like cardiac massage.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Basically, if we ram into the Circuleum,
the shockwaves may restart it. Can't say
I've ever done anything like this before,
but I've got no better ideas, sadly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.text:
That sounds like a rather fanciful idea,
but even a thin hope is better than none.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.text:
We've nae time for discussion.
Let's hurry!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.text:
We build up momentum from here
and ram into the Circuleum!

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
That shockwave wasn't strong enough.
Best start from farther away.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text: Curses! The malignancies have found us!

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text:
We did it, love!
The Circuleum's beating again!

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
That shockwave may have been a wee bit
too strong, but at least the Circuleum is
beating again.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.text: Fine work on your rounds today, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Look there! That’s the high priest.
Byaku reports to him, I think.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.text:
May I ask where you've been, Your Eminence?
I thought the Circuleum was your post.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.text:
I had urgent business elsewhere.
How are the other temples looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.text:
There were anomalies in all of them.
We took emergency measures in each case,
but the situation remains terribly unstable.
And I fear there is even worse news...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Safed is dead. Murdered in cold blood
by an unknown assailant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.text: Mmm. I'm sorry to hear it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.text: May I ask a question, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Why did you try to destroy the temples?
And why did you take Safed's life!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.text: What are ye asking him for?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.text:
That is a dangerous accusation to be
bandying about without proof, Byaku.
Most dangerous indeed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.text:
But I do have proof, Your Eminence.
For while malignancies caused the anomalies
at the temples, it is obvious the damage
was inflicted with great purpose.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Additionally, Safed's wounds were
clearly not the work of a malignancy,
but of a fellow priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.text:
And the only one who would have had the
opportunity to lay him low was you,
High Priest Valkoinen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.text:
Hmph! A fine deduction, Byaku. But what you
fail to grasp is that all I have done was in
accordance with the will of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.text: How can you possibly claim such!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.text:
...A malignancy? By the Kosmos!
The high priest has become malignant!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.text:
And now, Byaku, it is the will of the
Kosmos that you join Safed in death.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.text:
The Kosmos has begun to initiate its own
ruination. Now let us see if you can resist
when your new destiny is bestowed upon
you by the universe itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.text:
I dinnae understand what
is happening here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.text:
I've never heard of a benignancy turning into
a malignancy, nor of the Kosmos initiating its
own ruination. But I also cannot dismiss such
claims as mere tomfoolery.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.text:
My rounds are now finished, Diva.
I am deeply grateful for your help,
and sorry to have imposed upon you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.text: So what'll ye do now, love?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Maintaining peace within the Kosmos is my
sacred duty. Even if I must do it alone,
I will never cease my vigil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Are you certain? Though I cannot begin
to imagine what will happen next, I fear
you will be placing your life in danger.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.text:
Oh, it's no problem for a mechanical
lass like me. Now then, where to?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.text:
We go to the place where priests are
born in search of further information.

SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.text:
Aye, it appears I could exit
this world through here.

SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.text: I've got more yet to do here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold Thymus, the place from which we
priests hail. Most of the benignancies
that live in the Kosmos were born here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
As many benignancies still live here now,
one may know more about what's happening.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I cannae see this large population
of benignancies, though.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Something is wrong here.
Be on guard, Diva.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Malignancies... And so many!
How did they manage to break in here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I'm afraid they have suffered the
same fate as your high priest:
transforming into malignancies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: What can this mean? Could there possibly be an abnormality within the Kosmos itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.text:
There's still a malignancy
over there, love.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
No, wait! I'm not malignant!
Are you two still normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
You're a priest, right? Thank the Kosmos!
Not sure about the weird growth standing
next to you there, but...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Dinnae realize I was such a
strange sight around here...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.text: You there. You're a carrier, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Skittish cowards who run about dodging
malignancies as they transport things
from one place to another.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, that's charming, especially coming from the
mouth of someone whose high priest was just killed.
Also, if you two are all that stands between chaos
and the Kosmos, I think we're all screwed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.text:
I've not heard your name yet,
Ms. Carrier, ma'am.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.text: This is Byaku. He's a priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.text:
Do you even know what you were fighting
when you battled those malignancies earlier?
They used to be benign!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh, we are very much aware; when the
high priest turned malignant earlier,
we were forced to end his life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.text:
It would seem they all began to change after
hearing a divine message from the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.text:
The high priest also told us that the Kosmos
had initiated its own ruination. Do you know
anything about that, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.text: No, but it wouldn't surprise me if the Kosmos decided to destroy itself. I mean, just take a look around. Things are bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.text:
You're saying the Kosmos is transforming
benignancies into malignancies in order
to destroy itself from within, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.text:
Pretty much—but I'm not sure the Kosmos
actually knows that's what it's doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_220.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_220.text:
So it's being controlled
by something else?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.text:
It seems someone has interfered with
the sacred will of the Kosmos and is
now pulling the strings, as it were.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.text:
I dinnae think it possible to override
the will of an entire world.
Who could do such a thing?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.text:
The legendary malignancy that deceived God,
took control of the masses, and destroyed
the world? That's a fairy tale for zygotes!
Canker doesn't actually exist!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.text:
Ah, but all folklore has foundation in fact.
Why can't it actually be a real event
that occurred in the long-distant past?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.text:
If we assume for the moment that you are
correct, I suppose the return of Canker would
be enough to explain these abnormalities...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.text:
Then let's get out there and give
this Canker a proper thrashing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.text:
You do not understand. Canker is immortal.
If he truly has returned to this world,
there is nothing we can do to stop him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.text:
Actually, there might be one way—although
it would involve a priest like you working
very closely with a carrier like me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.text:
Absurd! No priest would ever join forces
with a mere carrier!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.text:
Figured you'd say that. Well, good luck
handling things by yourself, then!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.text:
W-wait! It is my sworn duty to protect this world.
So for the sake of that duty, I will—just this
once—debase myself to a level where I cooperate
with your lowly self.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.text:
No. Please. Stop, I can't take
so much flattery all at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.text:
Anyway, I'll take that as a yes and go on
ahead. When you're ready, come outside
so I can explain the details.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.text:
You seem to be in a proper snit with Erytheia,
love—but don't we need her to get this whole
problem sorted?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.text:
Spare me your chiding! I trust Erytheia like
I trust a cyst, yet we have no other leads.
But the moment she does anything strange...
you know what to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Do you understand what this clump is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh dear. This one is showing all the
visual characteristics of a tumor—
AND I get energy readings from it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
This is one of Canker's roots. He uses these
to suck the life force of the Kosmos from its
temples, which is what allows him to grow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Wait... Something's amiss at the temples!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Because of Canker, the balance of the
entire Kosmos has begun to collapse.
We don't have much time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: So what do we do, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy powers that have been sealed within
the four great temples—ones said to be
effective against even the power of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I find it very odd that you—a priest—
are unaware of this. I thought it was a secret
that was passed down through your order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Not nearly as odd as the fact that it's
known by a base carrier such as yourself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Transmitting info is a carrier's job;
we tend to pick up whispers along the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, well, how do you intend to use these
antibodies against Canker when we don't
even know where the creature is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Easy! We pump 'em into his roots
at the sides of the temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Turning the lug's own roots against him!
Oh, but that's brilliant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
You two can choose which temple to start with,
but we need to do this thing fast.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and one more thing: we need the power
of prayer to unseal the antibodies,
which is where Byaku comes in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That's the voice of the Circuleum.
It's controlling Byaku now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.text: Why do you seek this power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.text: I want to save the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Wonderful! Let's pump these
antibodies into Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text:
Now we pump in
the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text:
Then let's pop off to the next
temple quick as anything!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Digestica speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.text:
Display to me thine wisdom so I might
deem you worthy of my antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Full is truth, and hungry is false.
Full, hungry, full, hungry expresses 10.
You supplicants must now express 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.text:
I think it wants us to figure out what
combination of the words 'full' and 'hungry'
will combine to express the number 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.text:
If full, hungry, full, hungry is 10,
then 100 would be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.text: Full, full, hungry, hungry, full, hungry, hungry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.text: Oh, what a shame. I was mistaken.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_16.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_16.text: Happens to the best of us!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.text:
O ye who are bereft of wisdom,
show me instead thine might!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_21.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_21.text: Boy, you really know your stuff!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.text:
Thy request is granted.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.text:
Now let's pump these antibodies
into Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.text:
Your might is impressive, supplicant.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.text:
Now let's pump these antibodies
into Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I am sorry, Blan, but those who have become
malignancies can never again be benign.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes, of course... Forgive me, sir.
I...I won't cause you any trouble.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.text: Blan, no! What are you doing!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Was that a bit of cellular apoptosis?
It felt...different, somehow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Respiquary speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Let's bring these antibodies
to Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
The malignancies will get in the way.
Deal with them first!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.text: That's not Safed. It's a malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, poor Safed. He deserves to be at peace.
Might I ask you to grant him that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Cognitheon speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Let's take these antibodies
to Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text:
Let's pump these antibodies
into Canker's root.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: That was the last of the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: I no longer sense the presence of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
I thought we mended this temple.
Why is it so unhealthy, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
And something is emerging
from the inside!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Canker!? But we defeated him!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
He's metastasized; his physical form
has already found refuge here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Ach, and we've no more antibodies
with which to fight it!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Yes, but the antibodies have weakened him;
you should be able to destroy him now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Aye, then I'll give this thing
a proper throwing down!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: It's done.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: No. It's not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Nae, Canker's dead as a doornail, love.
I'm detecting no life signs.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh, he's dead all right...for the moment.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Don't get all cryptic on me!
What's going on here!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Canker is an immortal malignancy that
always returns to life eventually.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Then this was all for nothing?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
No. The corpse must be removed from
the Kosmos so it can never again return.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Madness! If we leave the Kosmos, we may never
be able to return! And even if we wanted to
take the risk, how can we possibly transport
so large a corpse!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You? You won't do anything.
But me? Well, I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Nae, Erytheia!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Needless to say, this will be my final task.
I'll head out right away.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Carri... Nay, Erytheia. Thank you.
And please know that I am sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What's gotten into you, Byaku?
This isn't like you at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Thanks for all your help as well,
Diva. Be well...and goodbye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Farewell to ye, Erytheia—
and cheers for everything.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_00.text: Might we please hurry this along?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.text: Is it time for you to go?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Aye, I'm afraid so.
Cheers to ye, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
A part of me wishes I could go with you,
but alas, my priestly duties require me
to remain here and protect the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Thanks to ye and your order preserving the
integrity of this immune system, I was able
to gather a great deal of lovely data.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I understood very little of that,
but I hope it somehow helps you
find your missing heart.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.text:
What are those things growing
around the temple, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.text:
Those are the mucolisks. It is their duty to absorb
things which have been drawn into the Kosmos
and transport them to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.text:
Ah, mucous membranes. Also,
the mucolisks there seem to be
operating a wee bit abnormally.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.text:
Yes, something certainly seems to be amiss.
Perhaps they have been overloaded by excessive
activity? This would also explain why the
Digestica is in such poor condition.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.text:
Oh dear, the Kosmos is having a spot of
indigestion. How are we to mend this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.text:
Fortunately, some of the mucolisks seem to
be functioning normally. Let us attempt to
harvest a bit of healthy mucus from them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.text:
Those mucolisks seem to be functioning
properly. So we harvest their mucus,
and then what happens?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.text:
We culture the harvested mucus in the Digestica,
which will send it back out to the mucolisks.
Absorbing this new healthy mucus should bring
them back to their normal selves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.text:
Ah, I see. Right then!
Let's start gathering healthy mucus.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.text:
Just watch for the overloaded mucolisks!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.text:
Go harvest mucus from the functioning mucolisks,
but watch out for the overloaded ones!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: We should have enough mucus now.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text:
Then let's get back
to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Now the power of the Digestica will cultivate
the mucus and send it out to the mucolisks.
That should be enough to restore them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.text:
With the mucolisks functioning normally,
the Digestica is quite healthy again.
But what overloaded those mucolisks
to begin with?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.text:
I imagine they were reacting to an excessive—
and unknown—stimulus. We will need to perform
a full investigation at a later time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.text: For now, we continue our rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary is the temple that regulates
the atmosphere of the Kosmos. We should find
my subordinate Blan somewhere around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
We have a serious problem here, sir!
A malignancy lurks in the alveoli!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm not entirely sure, sir!
Probably one of the unhealthy ones?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The alveoli must be these air cells
that surround the temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
The darker alveoli are operating abnormally,
likely due to a malignancy in their midst.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
I should investigate them one by one
and see what I'm able to find.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Look at this foreign body strolling around
like she owns the place! Should I take her
out with extreme prejudice, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Easy, Blan. She is my guardian—and while
she may be a foreign body, I trust she knows
about that of which she speaks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.text:
If we check each alveoli in turn,
we'll find the malignancy.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I don't see any around here.
Any luck with you, Blan?

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It must be closer to the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It might be further from the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It has to be somewhere on the side
closer to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It could be somewhere on the side
closer to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hang on... Oh yeah, I think there's
still a malignancy around here, sir.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: Jinks! We've got to find it.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I sense no more malignancies, sir.
I think we excised them all.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Then all that's left to do is
restore the Respiquary itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I will revive the Respiquary.
Lend me your aid, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.text: Everything should be fine now, sir!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.text: Still, it's unusual for malignancies to attack around the Respiquary instead of simply assaulting it directly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.text:
It's almost like they're learning, sir!
Which is VERY disturbing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.text:
Aye, that sounds proper frightening.
Let's get to the next temple, then.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Circuleum—that which maintains the
very life of the Kosmos. It is a temple guarded
by our High Priest Valkoinen himself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your Eminence! Are you here!?
It's Byaku, I've come on my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.text:
High Priest Valkoinen!
Wh-what happened here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.text:
We were attacked by a pack of malignancies.
I'm excising them as fast as I am able,
but there are simply too many to deal with.
You must lend me your aid!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.text:
I'll take care of them, sir!
...Diva? Take care of them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.text:
You are quite the potent warrior, friend.
But who are you, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I'm Songstress Diva No. 5,
and I'm Byaku's guardian.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.text:
Well then, Diva, I think I could make
use of your particular brand of help.
Will you hear my request?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_040.text: I'll do my best to sort it, sir.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.text:
As you have no doubt observed, there is an
abnormality in the Circuleum. I would like
to stop nibbling around the edges and deal
with the problem at its source.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.text:
So those malignancies we fought
weren't the problem, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.text:
No, the abnormality has a different source.
Look there, if you would.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.text: Thymus is enveloped in a wall of fat!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_010.text:
Thymus, is it? Named after the
lymphoid organ, I suspect.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.text:
Thymus is the homeland of all
who dwell within the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.text:
Every day, new citizens are born in Thymus.
The work they do serves as a major power
source for the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.text:
Sadly, the sudden appearance of that wall
is interfering with their activities.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.text:
I cannae see through that wall of fat,
but your comrades are trapped inside it?
Wee bit gross, that. How do I free them?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.text:
You seem to know a great deal about
the inner workings of the Kosmos, Diva! But yes, if you smear these mitochondria
clockwise around the entire wall,
that should take care of the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.text: Then I'll go do just that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.text:
As I cannot abandon my post, I'm trusting
the two of you to deal with this in my stead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.text:
You will need to circle around the wall
clockwise in order to smear the mitochondria
onto it and release those trapped within.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text: Ah, excellent! The wall is gone.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
The mitochondria burned the fat off
the wall—though I've still no idea
why we had to do the thing clockwise.

SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_DIVA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
Regardless, we should report our success
to the high priest at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.text:
My thanks for your efforts. The Circuleum
should be up and running again in no time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Beg pardon, sir, but why did we
have to do all that clockwise?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.text:
A mystery, is it?
Aye, I can respect that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.text:
If I may, Your Eminence, what made
that wall appear in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't know. Perhaps it was malignancies—or
perhaps not. Such a thing has not happened before,
and I intend to perform a full investigation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.text: Then on to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That is the Cognitheon—the command center which
controls the other holy sites. A contemporary of mine
named Safed is in charge of its defense.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, Safed. Any irregularities
here at the Cognitheon?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Something is definitely wrong here:
the electrical flow from the circuits
is unstable, which leaves the Cognitheon
running at a diminished capacity.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The circuits are the cranial nerves
around the temple, aye? They appear
to be functioning abnormally.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.text:
There's something rather strange
about the circuits over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Stress, perhaps? The nerves do
seem a wee bit oversensitive.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.text:
That is the diva.
She's protecting me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Aren't you going to the
mend the circuits, love?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Much as I'd love to do that, keeping the
Cognitheon running is a full-time job.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.text:
Do not overstep, Diva; you are
strictly here to protect me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.text:
Seems like quite a protector!
I know I'd appreciate her help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.text:
Hold, Diva! You won't be able to repair
them alone, so I'll come with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.text: Despite my insistence on accompanying you, I don't actually have the faintest idea how to go about repairing them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.text:
There appears to be a pattern
to the blinking of the circuits.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Of course! The order in which they're flickering
is the way the electricity flows, which means
we should fix them in the same order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.text:
They're flickering in the same order as the
flow of electricity, which means we need to
fix them in the order of the flickers.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text:
Oh dear, I misunderstood that.
So sorry, love.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Then we start over from the beginning.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
Let us return to the Cognitheon
and report our success to Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished mending
the circuits, Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Wonderful! In that case, the Cognitheon
should return to normal capacity soon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Except... Oh no! It's being infiltrated
by malignancies! Please, Diva!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.text:
The Cognitheon has been restored.
Thank you both for your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I still don't understand why the circuits
failed in the first place, but I suppose
we'll have to accept this as good enough.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.text: Now then, on with my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.text:
That completes my rounds. You were
quite a big help, Diva—my apologies
at having kept you for so long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.text:
We traversed much of the Kosmos,
but I dinnae see my heart anywhere.
I wonder where it could be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.text:
It is said that there is heart everywhere
within the Kosmos, and nowhere within
the Kosmos, and you are free to go see
the truth of this for yourself. As for me, I fear I've other duties
which must be attended to.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_040.text: So sorry, but I cannae aid ye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_051.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_051.text:
Now we can finally move on
to the next world.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.text: You're a strange one, but I am happy to have the protection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_070.text:
I will not let harm come to ye.
Now where to next?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.text: I have business in Thymus. Let us be off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I had a feeling you'd come once I heard
the news, Byaku. Er, but who's this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm Byaku's bodyguard,
Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. Well, I'm Erytheia,
and I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Carriers risk their lives transporting both
objects and information from place to place.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Do we require something
to be transported, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.text:
No. We are here to access her vast knowledge.
Erytheia, do you have any insights into this
strange string of recent incidents?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it's certainly different from the
malignancies' usual routine. It's almost like
they're observing how we go about our work.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.text:
So their goal is not to destroy the Kosmos,
but to learn more about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.text:
That tracks with what I've seen.
The question is, why?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedBloodCell
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Halp! Haaalp! A giant foreign body has
appeared outside—one we've never seen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
Is that not a malignancy? Er, though
it does look a wee bit different
from the ones we fought previously.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
That's not a malignancy—it's a parasite.
I never imagined I'd see one with my
own eye, but here we are.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I've heard of parasites: they're bothersome
foreign bodies that suck the life from
other, better creatures.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Parasites possess the ability to control
malignancies; I think it's safe to conclude
that all of this is their doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.text:
What do these parasites
mean to do, then?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Probably take over the Kosmos, though
I have no idea how they intend to do it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.text:
I will never permit that to happen.
Excise them, Diva!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.text: Excise them all! Let none survive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.text:
Your devious schemes end here,
foul parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.text: I will never let you take the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: That should be the last of the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Wait! Something's amiss at the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text:
I sense abnormalities...
Ach! Something's happening!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.text:
Those are the remnants
of the parasites!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.text: The Cognitheon is the brain of the Kosmos. If the parasite can establish itself there, it can usurp its will and become the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Perhaps that was the plan all along and
the other parasites were but distractions.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
And we completely fell for it.
A massive miscalculation!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.text:
The parasite has already begun to fuse!
It's sucking power out of the Cognitheon
in order to strengthen itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.text: There must be something we can do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Wait, look at the circuits over there...
They're still operating—though barely.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.text: Those are the circuits we repaired earlier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.text:
What if we repaired these circuits again and
restored the flow of electricity to the Cognitheon?
Would that not stop the fusion?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.text: It's certainly worth a try. Er, do you know how to do that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.text:
We fix them in the order they're
blinking, just like before.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.text:
We'll only have one chance at this.
Go, Songstress! For the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.text:
We need to repair the circuits
in the order they're blinking.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.text: We have but one chance! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.text:
Nothing for it now but to
knuckle up and face them!

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
Your repairs stopped the parasite from
seizing control, and also gave the
Cognitheon the power to fight it off.

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
That gives us a chance to excise
the parasite for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_000_000.text: Time to excise some wee beasties!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.text:
With the flow of electricity severed,
it will attempt to take over again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.text: We need to repair the circuits again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.text:
We need to repair those
circuits while we can!

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's on the move again!
Get back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_DIVA_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's been repelled!
Now's our chance!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_000.text:
It seems the threat posed by those nasty parasites
has passed. Still, I can't really think of any special
meaning this might hold for us, so let's just move
on to the next world.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.text:
Excision complete. The Kosmos
is at peace once more.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_011.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_011.text:
Thank you for your help, Diva.
We couldn't have done it without you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.text:
Yet in the end, I found nothing that
resembled my heart. Where could it be?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.text:
It is said there is heart everywhere within
the Kosmos and nowhere within the
Kosmos—yet I have seen no sign of it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.text: And here is the way out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.text:
Farewell to ye Byaku.
And ye, Erytheia.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.text: Wait, Diva. Take me with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.text:
Ye want to help search for my heart?
Are ye sure?

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Deadly so. In fact, I'm going with you
whether you want me to or not!

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.text: Ha ha ha! Just take him already.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.text: Cheers, love—and welcome to the team.

SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_DIVA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.text:
Goodbye, old friend!
See you again someday.
